messages.title: ARE THE TORIES A CHANGE YOU CAN AFFORD?
messages.content: When it comes to the General Election take a long, hard look at the Tories.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour guarantees that if your GP suspects cancer you will have a right to see a specialist within two weeks.

issues.health: The NHS provided excellent care and treatment for cancer, as shared by Sue Reaney, a cancer survivor. She was grateful for the Labour government for the timely help she received. The leaflet warns that the Tories would scrap the right to see a cancer specialist within two weeks if the Labour party is not elected.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sue Reaney, a cancer survivor, shares her personal story of receiving timely and high-quality care from the NHS for her cancer treatment, expressing gratitude towards the Labour government.

endorsements.endorsement: Expressed her gratitude for the timely and quality treatment she received from the NHS for her cancer, crediting the Labour government.

quotes.text: I was screened for cancer when I turned 50, and was stunned when the doctor told me I had cancer in my left breast. I can't praise the NHS enough for the care they gave me.

images.caption: Testimony of Sue Reaney, praising the NHS for cancer treatment

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on the healthcare achievements under Labour, particularly the right to see a cancer specialist within two weeks, and positions the Tories as a threat to this policy.
